Cisco-IOS-XR-clns-isis-cfg API API Reference

API generated from Cisco-IOS-XR-clns-isis-cfg@2017-12-15.yang

API Endpoint
http://{Controller-IP}:{Controller-Port}/restconf/config/network-topology:network-topology/topology/topology-netconf/node/inetri/yang-ext:mount/
URL '/' code: %2F
Schemes: http
Version: 1.0.0
Leaf Color Code:
   Key  Mandatory  Optional

Paths

INSTANCE - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-clns-isis-cfg:isis/instances/instance/{instance-name}/

Update operation of resource: instance

instance_schema

instancebody object

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    : {
Stagger ISIS adjacency bring upPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      
"max-nbr": "integer", Adjacency Stagger: Subsequent simultaneous\nnumber of neighbors to bring up
range: "2..65000"
default: "64"

      
"initial-nbr": "integer" Adjacency Stagger: Initial number of\nneighbors to bring up per area
range: "2..65000"
default: "2"

    },
    : {

range: "0..2"
default: "0"

        }
      ]

range: "0..2"
default: "0"

        }
      ]

range: "0..120000"
units: "millisecond"

range: "0..120000"

range: "32..4294967295"

range: "0..2"
default: "0"

    },
    
"log-pdu-drops": "null", Log PDU drops
    : {
IS-IS NSF configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      
"lifetime": "integer", Seconds
range: "1..65535"
units: "second"
default: "90"

      
"flavor": "string", NSF not configured if item is deleted

      
"max-interface-timer-expiry": "integer", Maximum number of times an interface timer\nmay expire during an IETF-NSF restart before\nthe NSF restart is aborted. This\nconfiguration has no effect if IETF NSF is\nnot configured.
range: "1..10"
default: "10"

      
"interface-timer": "integer" Per-interface time period to wait for a\nrestart ACK during an IETF-NSF restart. This\nconfiguration has no effect if IETF-NSF is\nnot configured
range: "1..20"
units: "second"
default: "1"

    },
    
"dynamic-host-name": "boolean", If TRUE, dynamic hostname resolution is\ndisabled, and system IDs will always be\ndisplayed by show and debug output.

    
"running": "null", The presence of this object allows an\naddress-family to be run over the\ninterface in question.This must be the\nfirst object created under the\nInterfaceAddressFamily container, and the\nlast one deleted
    : {
Segment Routing Global Block configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      
"upper-bound": "integer", The upper bound of the SRGB
range: "16001..1048575"

      
"lower-bound": "integer" The lower bound of the SRGB
range: "16000..1048574"

    },
    : {

      : [

        {
          
"link-group-name": "string", Link Group Name

range: "2..64"
default: "2"

range: "0..16777215"

range: "2..64"
default: "2"

        }
      ]
    },

range: "5..86400"
units: "second"

range: "0..2"
default: "0"

        }
      ]
    },

"ignore-lsp-errors": "boolean", If TRUE, LSPs recieved with bad checksums will\nresult in the purging of that LSP from the LSP\nDB. If FALSE or not set, the received LSP will\njust be ignored.

    
"instance-id": "integer", Instance ID of the IS-IS process
range: "0..65535"
default: "0"

              : {
Control origination of a default route with\nthe option of using a policy.  If no policy\nis specified the default route is\nadvertised with zero cost in level 2 only.PUTPOSTDELETEGET
                
"policy-name": "string", Policy name

                
"external": "null", Flag to indicate that the default prefix\nshould be originated as an external route

              },
              
"topology-id": "integer", Set the topology ID for a named\n(non-default) topology. This object must be\nset before any other configuration is\nsupplied for a named (non-default) topology\n, and must be the last configuration object\nto be removed. This item should not be\nsupplied for the non-named default\ntopologies.
range: "6..4095"
              : {
Micro Loop Avoidance configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                
"rib-update-delay": "integer", Value of delay in msecs in updating RIB
range: "1000..65535"
units: "millisecond"
default: "5000"

                
"enable": "string" UCMP feature enable configuration

              },
              
"route-source-first-hop": "boolean", If TRUE, routes will be installed with the\nIP address of the first-hop node as the\nsource instead of the originating node

              
"default-admin-distance": "integer", Default IS-IS administrative distance\nconfiguration.
range: "1..255"
default: "115"

                : [

                    : [

                      {
                        
"as-xx": "integer", First half of BGP AS number in XX.YY\nformat.  Mandatory if Protocol is BGP\nand must not be specified otherwise.\nMust be a non-zero value if second half\nis zero.
range: "0..65535"

                        
"levels": "string", Levels to redistribute routes into

                        
"as-yy": "integer", Second half of BGP AS number in XX.YY\nformat. Mandatory if Protocol is BGP and\nmust not be specified otherwise. Must be\na non-zero value if first half is zero.
range: "0..4294967295"

                        
"metric": "integer", Allowed metric: <1-63> for narrow,\n<1-16777215> for wide
range: "1..16777215"

                      }

}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

INSTANCE - Create

POST Cisco-IOS-XR-clns-isis-cfg:isis/instances/instance/{instance-name}/

Create operation of resource: instance

instance_schema

instancebody object

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example

default: "0"

                  },
                  : {

                    : [

}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

INSTANCE - Delete

DELETE Cisco-IOS-XR-clns-isis-cfg:isis/instances/instance/{instance-name}/

Delete operation of resource: instance

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

INSTANCE - Retrieve

GET Cisco-IOS-XR-clns-isis-cfg:isis/instances/instance/{instance-name}/

Retrieve operation of resource: instance

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

200 OK
instance_schema

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json
Response Example (200 OK)

range: "0..2"
default: "0"

                    }
                  ]
                }
              },
              
"topology-id": "integer", Set the topology ID for a named\n(non-default) topology. This object must be\nset before any other configuration is\nsupplied for a named (non-default) topology\n, and must be the last configuration object\nto be removed. This item should not be\nsupplied for the non-named default\ntopologies.
range: "6..4095"

range: "0..2"
default: "0"

              }
            ]
          },

SRGB - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-clns-isis-cfg:isis/instances/instance/{instance-name}/srgb/

Update operation of resource: srgb

srgb_schema

srgbbody object

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
Segment Routing Global Block configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    
"upper-bound": "integer", The upper bound of the SRGB
range: "16001..1048575"

    
"lower-bound": "integer" The lower bound of the SRGB
range: "16000..1048574"

  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

lsp-generation-intervals_schema

lsp-generation-intervalsbody object

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
LSP generation-interval configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      {
        
"maximum-wait": "integer", Maximum wait before generating local LSP in\nmilliseconds
range: "0..120000"
units: "millisecond"

        
"initial-wait": "integer", Initial wait before generating local LSP in\nmilliseconds
range: "0..120000"
units: "millisecond"

        
"secondary-wait": "integer", Secondary wait before generating local LSP\nin milliseconds
range: "0..120000"
units: "millisecond"

        
"level": "string" Level to which configuration applies
range: "0..2"
default: "0"

      }
    ]
  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

AFS - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-clns-isis-cfg:isis/instances/instance/{instance-name}/afs/

Update operation of resource: afs

afs_schema

afsbody object

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
Per-address-family configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      {
        
"af-name": "string", Address family

        
"saf-name": "string", Sub address family
        : [
Topology NamePUTPOSTDELETEGET
          {
            : {
Summary-prefix configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                {
                  
"address-prefix": "string", IP route source prefix

                  
"tag": "integer", The tag value
range: "1..4294967295"

                  
"level": "integer" SPF Level for prefix prioritization
range: "0..2"
default: "0"

                }
              ]
            },
            
"advertise-passive-only": "null", If enabled, advertise prefixes of passive\ninterfaces only
            : {
Fast-ReRoute configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              : {
FRR use candidate only configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                  {
                    
"frr-type": "string", Computation Type

                    
"level": "string" SPF Level for prefix prioritization
range: "0..2"
default: "0"

                  }
                ]
              },
              : {
FRR tiebreakers configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                  {
                    
"tiebreaker": "string", Tiebreaker for which configuration\napplies

                    
"index": "integer", Preference order among tiebreakers
range: "1..255"

                    
"level": "string" SPF Level for prefix prioritization
range: "0..2"
default: "0"

                  }
                ]
              },
              : {
FRR prefix-limit configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                  {
                    
"priority": "string", Compute for all prefixes upto the\nspecified priority

                    
"frr-type": "string", Computation Type

                    
"level": "string" SPF Level for prefix prioritization
range: "0..2"
default: "0"

                  }
                ]
              },
              : {
Load share prefixes across multiple\nbackupsPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                  {
                    
"load-sharing": "string", Load sharing

                    
"level": "string" SPF Level for prefix prioritization
range: "0..2"
default: "0"

                  }
                ]
              },
              : {
FRR remote LFA prefix list filter\nconfigurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                  {
                    
"prefix-list-name": "string", Name of the Prefix List

                    
"level": "string" SPF Level for prefix prioritization
range: "0..2"
default: "0"

                  }
                ]
              }
            },
            : {
Route propagation configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                {
                  
"route-policy-name": "string", Route policy to control redistribution.

                  
"destination-level": "string", Destination level for routes.  Must\ndiffer from SourceLevel

                  
"source-level": "string" Source level for routes

                }
              ]
            },
            
"ignore-attached-bit": "boolean", If TRUE, Ignore other routers attached bit
            : {
SPF-interval configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                {
                  
"maximum-wait": "integer", Maximum wait before running a route\ncalculation in milliseconds
range: "0..120000"
units: "millisecond"

                  
"initial-wait": "integer", Initial wait before running a route\ncalculation in milliseconds
range: "0..120000"
units: "millisecond"

                  
"secondary-wait": "integer", Secondary wait before running a route\ncalculation in milliseconds
range: "0..120000"
units: "millisecond"

                  
"level": "string" SPF Level for prefix prioritization
range: "0..2"
default: "0"

                }
              ]
            },
            
"apply-weight": "string", Apply weights to UCMP or ECMP only
            : {
Traffic Engineering stable IP address for\nsystemPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              
"interface-name": "string", Name of the interface to be excluded

              
"address": "string" IPv4 address to be used as a router ID.\nPrecisely one of Address and Interface\nmust be specified.

            },
            : {
Peoridic SPF configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                {
                  
"periodic-interval": "integer", Maximum interval in between SPF runs in\nseconds
range: "0..3600"
units: "second"

                  
"level": "string" SPF Level for prefix prioritization
range: "0..2"
default: "0"

                }
              ]
            },
            : {
Per-route administrative\ndistanceconfigurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                {
                  
"distance": "integer", Administrative distance
range: "1..255"

                  
"prefix-list": "string", List of prefixes to which this distance\napplies

                  
"address-prefix": "string" IP route source prefix

                }
              ]
            },
            : {
MPLS LDP configuration. MPLS LDP\nconfiguration will only be applied for the\nIPv4-unicast address-family.PUTPOSTDELETEGET
              
"auto-config": "boolean" If TRUE, LDP will be enabled onall IS-IS\ninterfaces enabled for this address-family

            },
            : {
Metric-style configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                {
                  
"style": "string", Metric Style

                  
"level": "string" SPF Level for prefix prioritization
range: "0..2"
default: "0"

                }
              ]
            },
            : {
Manual Adjacecy SID configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                {
                  
"sid-type": "string", Sid type aboslute or index

                  
"level": "string", SPF Level for prefix prioritization
range: "0..2"
default: "0"

                  
"protected": "string", Enable/Disable SID protection

                  
"sid": "string" Sid value

                }
              ]
            },
            : {
Enable convergence monitoringPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              
"track-ip-frr": "null", Enable the Tracking of IP-Frr Convergence

              
"prefix-list": "string", List of prefixes to which this distance\napplies

              
"enable": "null" UCMP feature enable configuration

            },
            
"maximum-paths": "integer", Maximum number of active parallel paths per\nroute
range: "1..64"

            
"adjacency-check": "string", Suppress check for consistent AF support on\nreceived IIHs
            : {
Metric configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              : [
Metric for redistributed routes: <0-63>\nfor narrow, <0-16777215> for widePUTPOSTDELETEGET
                {
                  
"metric": "string", Metric for redistributed routes: <0-63>\nfor narrow, <0-16777215> for wide
range: "1..16777215"

                  
"level": "string" SPF Level for prefix prioritization
range: "0..2"
default: "0"

                }
              ]
            },
            : {
Enable Segment Routing configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              
"bundle-member-adj-sid": "null", Enable per bundle member adjacency SID

              
"mpls": "string", MPLS configuration. MPLS configuration will\nonly be applied for the IPv4-unicast\naddress-family.
              : {
Enable Segment Routing prefix SID map\nconfigurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                
"receive": "boolean", If TRUE, remote prefix SID map\nadvertisements will be used. If FALSE,\nthey will not be used.

                
"advertise-local": "null" Enable Segment Routing prefix SID map\nadvertise local

              }
            },
            
"advertise-link-attributes": "boolean", If TRUE, advertise additional link\nattributes in our LSP
            : {
Filter routes sent to the RIBPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              
"prefix-list-name": "string", Name of the Prefix List

              
"route-policy-name": "string" Route policy to control redistribution.

            },
            
"single-topology": "null", Run IPv6 Unicast using the standard (IPv4\nUnicast) topology
            : {
Control origination of a default route with\nthe option of using a policy.  If no policy\nis specified the default route is\nadvertised with zero cost in level 2 only.PUTPOSTDELETEGET
              
"policy-name": "string", Policy name

              
"external": "null", Flag to indicate that the default prefix\nshould be originated as an external route

              
"use-policy": "boolean" Flag to indicate whether default\norigination is controlled using a policy

            },
            : {
ISPF configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              : {
ISPF state (enable/disable)PUTPOSTDELETEGET
                : [
StatePUTPOSTDELETEGET
                  {
                    
"state": "string", State

                    
"level": "string" SPF Level for prefix prioritization
range: "0..2"
default: "0"

                  }
                ]
              }
            },
            
"topology-id": "integer", Set the topology ID for a named\n(non-default) topology. This object must be\nset before any other configuration is\nsupplied for a named (non-default) topology\n, and must be the last configuration object\nto be removed. This item should not be\nsupplied for the non-named default\ntopologies.
range: "6..4095"
            : {
Micro Loop Avoidance configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              
"rib-update-delay": "integer", Value of delay in msecs in updating RIB
range: "1000..65535"
units: "millisecond"
default: "5000"

              
"enable": "string" UCMP feature enable configuration

            },
            
"route-source-first-hop": "boolean", If TRUE, routes will be installed with the\nIP address of the first-hop node as the\nsource instead of the originating node

            
"default-admin-distance": "integer", Default IS-IS administrative distance\nconfiguration.
range: "1..255"
default: "115"
            : {
Protocol redistribution configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                {
                  : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                    {
                      
"as-xx": "integer", First half of BGP AS number in XX.YY\nformat.  Mandatory if Protocol is BGP\nand must not be specified otherwise.\nMust be a non-zero value if second half\nis zero.
range: "0..65535"

                      
"levels": "string", Levels to redistribute routes into

                      
"as-yy": "integer", Second half of BGP AS number in XX.YY\nformat. Mandatory if Protocol is BGP and\nmust not be specified otherwise. Must be\na non-zero value if first half is zero.
range: "0..4294967295"

                      
"metric": "integer", Metric for redistributed routes: <0-63>\nfor narrow, <0-16777215> for wide
range: "1..16777215"

                      
"metric-type": "string", IS-IS metric type

                      
"ospf-route-type": "integer", OSPF route types to redistribute.  May\nonly be specified if Protocol is OSPF.

                    }
                  ],

200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

AFS - Create

POST Cisco-IOS-XR-clns-isis-cfg:isis/instances/instance/{instance-name}/afs/

Create operation of resource: afs

afs_schema

afsbody object

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {

            },

range: "1..64"

              : [

range: "1..16777215"

range: "0..2"
default: "0"

                }
              ]

              : {
Enable Segment Routing prefix SID map\nconfigurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                
"receive": "boolean", If TRUE, remote prefix SID map\nadvertisements will be used. If FALSE,\nthey will not be used.

                
"advertise-local": "null" Enable Segment Routing prefix SID map\nadvertise local

              }
            },
            
"advertise-link-attributes": "boolean", If TRUE, advertise additional link\nattributes in our LSP

            },
            
"single-topology": "null", Run IPv6 Unicast using the standard (IPv4\nUnicast) topology
            : {
Control origination of a default route with\nthe option of using a policy.  If no policy\nis specified the default route is\nadvertised with zero cost in level 2 only.PUTPOSTDELETEGET
              
"policy-name": "string", Policy name

              
"external": "null", Flag to indicate that the default prefix\nshould be originated as an external route

This object must be\nset before any other configuration is\nsupplied for a named (non-default) topology\n, and must be the last configuration object\nto be removed. This item should not be\nsupplied for the non-named default\ntopologies.
range: "6..4095"

units: "millisecond"
default: "5000"

}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

AFS - Delete

DELETE Cisco-IOS-XR-clns-isis-cfg:isis/instances/instance/{instance-name}/afs/

Delete operation of resource: afs

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

AFS - Retrieve

GET Cisco-IOS-XR-clns-isis-cfg:isis/instances/instance/{instance-name}/afs/

Retrieve operation of resource: afs

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

200 OK
afs_schema

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json
Response Example (200 OK) 
{
  : {
Per-address-family configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      {
        
"af-name": "string", Address family

        
"saf-name": "string", Sub address family
        : [
Topology NamePUTPOSTDELETEGET
          {
            : {
Summary-prefix configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                {
                  
"address-prefix": "string", IP route source prefix

                  
"tag": "integer", The tag value
range: "1..4294967295"

                  
"level": "integer" SPF Level for prefix prioritization
range: "0..2"
default: "0"

                }
              ]
            },
            
"advertise-passive-only": "null", If enabled, advertise prefixes of passive\ninterfaces only
            : {
Fast-ReRoute configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              : {
FRR use candidate only configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                  {
                    
"frr-type": "string", Computation Type

                    
"level": "string" SPF Level for prefix prioritization
range: "0..2"
default: "0"

                  }
                ]
              },
              : {

                : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                  {
                    
"tiebreaker": "string", Tiebreaker for which configuration\napplies

                    
"index": "integer", Preference order among tiebreakers
range: "1..255"

                    
"level": "string" SPF Level for prefix prioritization
range: "0..2"
default: "0"

                  }
                ]
              },

                }
              ]
            },

units: "millisecond"

range: "0..120000"

range: "0..120000"
units: "millisecond"

default: "0"

This object must be\nset before any other configuration is\nsupplied for a named (non-default) topology\n, and must be the last configuration object\nto be removed. This item should not be\nsupplied for the non-named default\ntopologies.

range: "0..65535"

                      
"levels": "string", Levels to redistribute routes into

                      
"as-yy": "integer", Second half of BGP AS number in XX.YY\nformat. Mandatory if Protocol is BGP and\nmust not be specified otherwise. Must be\na non-zero value if first half is zero.
range: "0..4294967295"

range: "1..16777215"

              {

range: "1..28000"

                
"level": "string" SPF Level for prefix prioritization
range: "0..2"
default: "0"

              }
            ]
          },
          : {
MPLS configuration. MPLS configuration will\nonly be applied for the IPv4-unicast\naddress-family.PUTPOSTDELETEGET
            
"igp-intact": "null", Install TE and non-TE nexthops in the RIB

            
"multicast-intact": "null", Install non-TE nexthops in the RIB for use\nby multicast
            : {
Traffic Engineering stable IP address for\nsystemPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              
"interface-name": "string", Name of the interface to be excluded

              
"address": "string" IPv4 address to be used as a router ID.\nPrecisely one of Address and Interface\nmust be specified.

            },
            : {
SPF Level for prefix prioritizationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              
"level1": "boolean", Level 1 enabled

              
"level2": "boolean" Level 2 enabled

            }
          },
          : {
Weight configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            : [
Weight to be configured under interface for\nLoad Balancing. Allowed weight: <1-16777215>PUTPOSTDELETEGET
              {
                
"weight": "integer", Weight to be configured under interface for\nLoad Balancing. Allowed weight: <1-16777215>
range: "1..16777214"

                
"level": "string" SPF Level for prefix prioritization
range: "0..2"
default: "0"

              }
            ]
          },
          : {
SPF Prefix Priority configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              {
                
"prefix-priority-type": "string", SPF Priority to assign matching prefixes

                
"admin-tag": "integer", Tag value to determine prefixes for this\npriority
range: "1..4294967295"

                
"access-list-name": "string", Access List to determine prefixes for\nthis priority

                
"level": "string" SPF Level for prefix prioritization
range: "0..2"
default: "0"

              }
            ]
          },
          : {
UCMP (UnEqual Cost MultiPath) configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            : {
Interfaces excluded from UCMP path\ncomputationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                {
                  
"interface-name": "string" Name of the interface to be excluded

                }
              ]
            },
            : {
UCMP feature enable configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              
"variance": "integer", Value of variance
range: "101..10000"
default: "200"

              
"prefix-list-name": "string" Name of the Prefix List

            },
            
"delay-interval": "integer" Delay in msecs between primary SPF and\nUCMP computation
range: "100..65535"
units: "millisecond"
default: "100"

          }
        }
      }
    ]
  }
}

AF - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-clns-isis-cfg:isis/instances/instance/{instance-name}/afs/af/{af-name saf-name}/

Update operation of resource: af

af_schema

afbody object

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

af-name saf-name: string
in path

ID of af-name saf-name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    {
      
"af-name": "string", Address family

      
"saf-name": "string", Sub address family
      : [
Topology NamePUTPOSTDELETEGET
        {
          : {
Summary-prefix configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              {
                
"address-prefix": "string", IP route source prefix

                
"tag": "integer", The tag value
range: "1..4294967295"

                
"level": "integer" SPF Level for prefix prioritization
range: "0..2"
default: "0"

              }
            ]
          },
          
"advertise-passive-only": "null", If enabled, advertise prefixes of passive\ninterfaces only
          : {

            : {

                }
              ]
            },
            : {

default: "0"

                }
              ]
            },

units: "millisecond"

          }
        },
        
"topology-id": "integer", Set the topology ID for a named\n(non-default) topology. This object must be\nset before any other configuration is\nsupplied for a named (non-default) topology\n, and must be the last configuration object\nto be removed. This item should not be\nsupplied for the non-named default\ntopologies.
range: "6..4095"
        : {
Micro Loop Avoidance configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          
"rib-update-delay": "integer", Value of delay in msecs in updating RIB
range: "1000..65535"
units: "millisecond"
default: "5000"

          
"enable": "string" UCMP feature enable configuration

        },
        
"route-source-first-hop": "boolean", If TRUE, routes will be installed with the\nIP address of the first-hop node as the\nsource instead of the originating node

        
"default-admin-distance": "integer", Default IS-IS administrative distance\nconfiguration.
range: "1..255"
default: "115"
        : {
Protocol redistribution configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            {
              : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                {
                  
"as-xx": "integer", First half of BGP AS number in XX.YY\nformat.  Mandatory if Protocol is BGP\nand must not be specified otherwise.\nMust be a non-zero value if second half\nis zero.
range: "0..65535"

                  
"levels": "string", Levels to redistribute routes into

                  
"as-yy": "integer", Second half of BGP AS number in XX.YY\nformat. Mandatory if Protocol is BGP and\nmust not be specified otherwise. Must be\na non-zero value if first half is zero.
range: "0..4294967295"

                  
"metric": "integer", Metric for redistributed routes: <0-63>\nfor narrow, <0-16777215> for wide
range: "1..16777215"

                  
"metric-type": "string", IS-IS metric type

                  
"ospf-route-type": "integer", OSPF route types to redistribute.  May\nonly be specified if Protocol is OSPF.

                  
"route-policy-name": "string" Route policy to control redistribution.

                }
              ],
              : [

                {
                  
"levels": "string", Levels to redistribute routes into

                  
"as-zz": "integer", Eigrp as number.
range: "1..65535"

                  
"metric": "integer", Metric for redistributed routes: <0-63>\nfor narrow, <0-16777215> for wide
range: "1..16777215"

                  
"metric-type": "string", IS-IS metric type

                  
"ospf-route-type": "integer", OSPF route types to redistribute.  May\nonly be specified if Protocol is OSPF.

                  
"route-policy-name": "string" Route policy to control redistribution.

                }
              ],
              
"protocol-name": "string", The protocol to be redistributed.  OSPFv3\nmay not be specified for an IPv4 topology\nand OSPF may not be specified for an IPv6\ntopology.
              : {
connected or static or rip or subscriber\nor mobilePUTPOSTDELETEGET

range: "1..16777215"

              },
              : [

                {

range: "1..16777215"

"ospf-route-type": "integer", OSPF route types to redistribute.  May\nonly be specified if Protocol is OSPF.

                }
              ]
            }
          ]
        },

        : {

range: "1..28000"

range: "0..2"
default: "0"

            }
          ]
        },
        : {
MPLS configuration. MPLS configuration will\nonly be applied for the IPv4-unicast\naddress-family.PUTPOSTDELETEGET
          
"igp-intact": "null", Install TE and non-TE nexthops in the RIB

          
"multicast-intact": "null", Install non-TE nexthops in the RIB for use\nby multicast
          : {
Traffic Engineering stable IP address for\nsystemPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            
"interface-name": "string", Name of the interface to be excluded

            
"address": "string" IPv4 address to be used as a router ID.\nPrecisely one of Address and Interface\nmust be specified.

          },
          : {
SPF Level for prefix prioritizationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            
"level1": "boolean", Level 1 enabled

            
"level2": "boolean" Level 2 enabled

          }
        },
        : {

          : [

            {

range: "1..16777214"

range: "0..2"
default: "0"

            }
          ]
        },
        : {
SPF Prefix Priority configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            {
              
"prefix-priority-type": "string", SPF Priority to assign matching prefixes

              
"admin-tag": "integer", Tag value to determine prefixes for this\npriority
range: "1..4294967295"

              
"access-list-name": "string", Access List to determine prefixes for\nthis priority

              
"level": "string" SPF Level for prefix prioritization
range: "0..2"
default: "0"

            }
          ]
        },
        : {

          : {

            : [

              {

              }
            ]
          },
          : {
UCMP feature enable configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            
"variance": "integer", Value of variance
range: "101..10000"
default: "200"

            
"prefix-list-name": "string" Name of the Prefix List

          },
          
"delay-interval": "integer" Delay in msecs between primary SPF and\nUCMP computation
range: "100..65535"
units: "millisecond"
default: "100"

        }
      }
    }
  ]
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

AF - Create

POST Cisco-IOS-XR-clns-isis-cfg:isis/instances/instance/{instance-name}/afs/af/{af-name saf-name}/

Create operation of resource: af

af_schema

afbody object

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

af-name saf-name: string
in path

ID of af-name saf-name

Request Content-Types: application/json

range: "1..255"

            }
          ]
        },
        : {

        },
        : {

default: "0"

default: "0"

            }
          ]

units: "millisecond"

range: "1..64"

This object must be\nset before any other configuration is\nsupplied for a named (non-default) topology\n, and must be the last configuration object\nto be removed. This item should not be\nsupplied for the non-named default\ntopologies.
range: "6..4095"

}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

AF - Delete

DELETE Cisco-IOS-XR-clns-isis-cfg:isis/instances/instance/{instance-name}/afs/af/{af-name saf-name}/

Delete operation of resource: af

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

af-name saf-name: string
in path

ID of af-name saf-name

200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

AF - Retrieve

GET Cisco-IOS-XR-clns-isis-cfg:isis/instances/instance/{instance-name}/afs/af/{af-name saf-name}/

Retrieve operation of resource: af

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

af-name saf-name: string
in path

ID of af-name saf-name

200 OK
af_schema

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json
Response Example (200 OK)

"level": "string" SPF Level for prefix prioritization
range: "0..2"
default: "0"

              }
            ]
          },
          : {
UCMP (UnEqual Cost MultiPath) configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            : {
Interfaces excluded from UCMP path\ncomputationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                {
                  
"interface-name": "string" Name of the interface to be excluded

                }
              ]
            },
            : {
UCMP feature enable configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              
"variance": "integer", Value of variance
range: "101..10000"
default: "200"

              
"prefix-list-name": "string" Name of the Prefix List

            },
            
"delay-interval": "integer" Delay in msecs between primary SPF and\nUCMP computation
range: "100..65535"
units: "millisecond"
default: "100"

          }
        }
      ],
      : {
Data container.PUTPOSTDELETEGET
        : {
Summary-prefix configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            {
              
"address-prefix": "string", IP route source prefix

range: "1..4294967295"

              
"level": "integer" SPF Level for prefix prioritization
range: "0..2"
default: "0"

            }
          ]
        },
        
"advertise-passive-only": "null", If enabled, advertise prefixes of passive\ninterfaces only
        : {
Fast-ReRoute configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          : {

            : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              {

range: "0..2"
default: "0"

              }
            ]
          },
          : {
FRR tiebreakers configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              {
                
"tiebreaker": "string", Tiebreaker for which configuration\napplies

                
"index": "integer", Preference order among tiebreakers
range: "1..255"

                
"level": "string" SPF Level for prefix prioritization
range: "0..2"
default: "0"

              }
            ]
          },
          : {
FRR prefix-limit configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              {
                
"priority": "string", Compute for all prefixes upto the\nspecified priority

range: "0..2"
default: "0"

              }
            ]
          },
          : {

            : [

              {

range: "0..2"
default: "0"

              }
            ]
          },
          : {

            : [

              {

range: "0..2"
default: "0"

              }
            ]
          }
        },
        : {
Route propagation configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            {
              
"route-policy-name": "string", Route policy to control redistribution.

              
"destination-level": "string", Destination level for routes.  Must\ndiffer from SourceLevel

              
"source-level": "string" Source level for routes

            }
          ]
        },
        
"ignore-attached-bit": "boolean", If TRUE, Ignore other routers attached bit
        : {
Enable convergence monitoringPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          
"track-ip-frr": "null", Enable the Tracking of IP-Frr Convergence

          
"prefix-list": "string", List of prefixes to which this distance\napplies

          
"enable": "null" UCMP feature enable configuration

        },
        
"apply-weight": "string", Apply weights to UCMP or ECMP only
        : {
Traffic Engineering stable IP address for\nsystemPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          
"interface-name": "string", Name of the interface to be excluded

          
"address": "string" IPv4 address to be used as a router ID.\nPrecisely one of Address and Interface\nmust be specified.

        },
        : {
Peoridic SPF configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            {
              
"periodic-interval": "integer", Maximum interval in between SPF runs in\nseconds
range: "0..3600"
units: "second"

              
"level": "string" SPF Level for prefix prioritization
range: "0..2"
default: "0"

            }
          ]
        },
        : {
Per-route administrative\ndistanceconfigurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            {
              
"distance": "integer", Administrative distance
range: "1..255"

              
"prefix-list": "string", List of prefixes to which this distance\napplies

              
"address-prefix": "string" IP route source prefix

            }
          ]
        },
        : {
MPLS LDP configuration. MPLS LDP\nconfiguration will only be applied for the\nIPv4-unicast address-family.PUTPOSTDELETEGET
          
"auto-config": "boolean" If TRUE, LDP will be enabled onall IS-IS\ninterfaces enabled for this address-family

        },
        : {
Metric-style configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            {
              
"style": "string", Metric Style

              
"level": "string" SPF Level for prefix prioritization
range: "0..2"
default: "0"

            }
          ]
        },
        : {

          : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            {
              
"sid-type": "string", Sid type aboslute or index

range: "0..2"
default: "0"

              
"protected": "string", Enable/Disable SID protection

              
"sid": "string" Sid value

            }
          ]
        },
        : {
SPF-interval configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            {
              
"maximum-wait": "integer", Maximum wait before running a route\ncalculation in milliseconds
range: "0..120000"
units: "millisecond"

              
"initial-wait": "integer", Initial wait before running a route\ncalculation in milliseconds
range: "0..120000"
units: "millisecond"

              
"secondary-wait": "integer", Secondary wait before running a route\ncalculation in milliseconds
range: "0..120000"
units: "millisecond"

              
"level": "string" SPF Level for prefix prioritization
range: "0..2"
default: "0"

            }
          ]
        },
        
"maximum-paths": "integer", Maximum number of active parallel paths per\nroute
range: "1..64"

        
"adjacency-check": "string", Suppress check for consistent AF support on\nreceived IIHs
        : {
Metric configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          : [
Metric for redistributed routes: <0-63>\nfor narrow, <0-16777215> for widePUTPOSTDELETEGET
            {
              
"metric": "string", Metric for redistributed routes: <0-63>\nfor narrow, <0-16777215> for wide
range: "1..16777215"

              
"level": "string" SPF Level for prefix prioritization
range: "0..2"
default: "0"

            }
          ]
        },
        : {
Enable Segment Routing configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          
"bundle-member-adj-sid": "null", Enable per bundle member adjacency SID

          
"mpls": "string", MPLS configuration. MPLS configuration will\nonly be applied for the IPv4-unicast\naddress-family.
          : {
Enable Segment Routing prefix SID map\nconfigurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            
"receive": "boolean", If TRUE, remote prefix SID map\nadvertisements will be used. If FALSE,\nthey will not be used.

            
"advertise-local": "null" Enable Segment Routing prefix SID map\nadvertise local

          }
        },
        
"advertise-link-attributes": "boolean", If TRUE, advertise additional link\nattributes in our LSP
        : {
Filter routes sent to the RIBPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          
"prefix-list-name": "string", Name of the Prefix List

          
"route-policy-name": "string" Route policy to control redistribution.

        },
        
"single-topology": "null", Run IPv6 Unicast using the standard (IPv4\nUnicast) topology
        : {
Control origination of a default route with\nthe option of using a policy.  If no policy\nis specified the default route is\nadvertised with zero cost in level 2 only.PUTPOSTDELETEGET
          
"policy-name": "string", Policy name

          
"external": "null", Flag to indicate that the default prefix\nshould be originated as an external route

          
"use-policy": "boolean" Flag to indicate whether default\norigination is controlled using a policy

        },
        : {
ISPF configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          : {

            : [

              {

"level": "string" SPF Level for prefix prioritization
range: "0..2"
default: "0"

              }
            ]
          }
        },
        
"topology-id": "integer", Set the topology ID for a named\n(non-default) topology. This object must be\nset before any other configuration is\nsupplied for a named (non-default) topology\n, and must be the last configuration object\nto be removed. This item should not be\nsupplied for the non-named default\ntopologies.
range: "6..4095"
        : {
Micro Loop Avoidance configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          
"rib-update-delay": "integer", Value of delay in msecs in updating RIB
range: "1000..65535"
units: "millisecond"
default: "5000"

          
"enable": "string" UCMP feature enable configuration

        },
        
"route-source-first-hop": "boolean", If TRUE, routes will be installed with the\nIP address of the first-hop node as the\nsource instead of the originating node

        
"default-admin-distance": "integer", Default IS-IS administrative distance\nconfiguration.
range: "1..255"
default: "115"
        : {
Protocol redistribution configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            {
              : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                {
                  
"as-xx": "integer", First half of BGP AS number in XX.YY\nformat.  Mandatory if Protocol is BGP\nand must not be specified otherwise.\nMust be a non-zero value if second half\nis zero.
range: "0..65535"

                  
"levels": "string", Levels to redistribute routes into

                  
"as-yy": "integer", Second half of BGP AS number in XX.YY\nformat. Mandatory if Protocol is BGP and\nmust not be specified otherwise. Must be\na non-zero value if first half is zero.
range: "0..4294967295"

                  
"metric": "integer", Metric for redistributed routes: <0-63>\nfor narrow, <0-16777215> for wide
range: "1..16777215"

                  
"metric-type": "string", IS-IS metric type

                  
"ospf-route-type": "integer", OSPF route types to redistribute.  May\nonly be specified if Protocol is OSPF.

                }
              ],
              : [

                {

range: "1..65535"

range: "1..16777215"

                  
"metric-type": "string", IS-IS metric type

                  
"ospf-route-type": "integer", OSPF route types to redistribute.  May\nonly be specified if Protocol is OSPF.

                  
"route-policy-name": "string" Route policy to control redistribution.

                }
              ],
              
"protocol-name": "string", The protocol to be redistributed.  OSPFv3\nmay not be specified for an IPv4 topology\nand OSPF may not be specified for an IPv6\ntopology.
              : {

range: "1..16777215"

              },

                {

range: "1..16777215"

                  
"metric-type": "string", IS-IS metric type

                  
"ospf-route-type": "integer", OSPF route types to redistribute.  May\nonly be specified if Protocol is OSPF.

                  
"route-policy-name": "string" Route policy to control redistribution.

                }
              ]
            }
          ]
        },

        : {

          : [

            {

range: "1..28000"

            }
          ]
        },
        : {

          : {

          },
          : {

          }
        },
        : {

          : [

range: "1..16777214"

range: "0..2"
default: "0"

            }
          ]
        },
        : {

          : [

            {

      }
    }
  ]
}

AF-DATA - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-clns-isis-cfg:isis/instances/instance/{instance-name}/afs/af/{af-name saf-name}/af-data/

Update operation of resource: af-data

af-data_schema

af-databody object

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

af-name saf-name: string
in path

ID of af-name saf-name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
Data container.PUTPOSTDELETEGET
    : {
Summary-prefix configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        {
          
"address-prefix": "string", IP route source prefix

          
"tag": "integer", The tag value
range: "1..4294967295"

          
"level": "integer" SPF Level for prefix prioritization
range: "0..2"
default: "0"

        }
      ]
    },
    
"advertise-passive-only": "null", If enabled, advertise prefixes of passive\ninterfaces only
    : {
Fast-ReRoute configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      : {

          {

          }

"route-policy-name": "string" Route policy to control redistribution.

            }
          ],
          : [

            {

range: "1..65535"

range: "1..16777215"

            }
          ],

        }
      ]

"igp-intact": "null", Install TE and non-TE nexthops in the RIB

      
"multicast-intact": "null", Install non-TE nexthops in the RIB for use\nby multicast
      : {
Traffic Engineering stable IP address for\nsystemPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        
"interface-name": "string", Name of the interface to be excluded

        
"address": "string" IPv4 address to be used as a router ID.\nPrecisely one of Address and Interface\nmust be specified.

      },
      : {

"level1": "boolean", Level 1 enabled

      }
    },
    : {

      : [

        {

range: "1..16777214"

range: "0..2"
default: "0"

        }
      ]
    },
    : {

      : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        {
          
"prefix-priority-type": "string", SPF Priority to assign matching prefixes

          
"admin-tag": "integer", Tag value to determine prefixes for this\npriority
range: "1..4294967295"

          
"access-list-name": "string", Access List to determine prefixes for\nthis priority

          
"level": "string" SPF Level for prefix prioritization
range: "0..2"
default: "0"

        }
      ]
    },
    : {

      : {

        : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          {
            
"interface-name": "string" Name of the interface to be excluded

          }
        ]
      },
      : {
UCMP feature enable configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        
"variance": "integer", Value of variance
range: "101..10000"
default: "200"

        
"prefix-list-name": "string" Name of the Prefix List

      },
      
"delay-interval": "integer" Delay in msecs between primary SPF and\nUCMP computation
range: "100..65535"
units: "millisecond"
default: "100"

    }
  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

AF-DATA - Create

POST Cisco-IOS-XR-clns-isis-cfg:isis/instances/instance/{instance-name}/afs/af/{af-name saf-name}/af-data/

Create operation of resource: af-data

af-data_schema

af-databody object

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

af-name saf-name: string
in path

ID of af-name saf-name

AF-DATA - Delete

DELETE Cisco-IOS-XR-clns-isis-cfg:isis/instances/instance/{instance-name}/afs/af/{af-name saf-name}/af-data/

Delete operation of resource: af-data

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

af-name saf-name: string
in path

ID of af-name saf-name

200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

range: "0..2"

"protected": "string", Enable/Disable SID protection

          
"sid": "string" Sid value

        }
      ]
    },
    : {
SPF-interval configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        {
          
"maximum-wait": "integer", Maximum wait before running a route\ncalculation in milliseconds
range: "0..120000"
units: "millisecond"

          
"initial-wait": "integer", Initial wait before running a route\ncalculation in milliseconds
range: "0..120000"
units: "millisecond"

          
"secondary-wait": "integer", Secondary wait before running a route\ncalculation in milliseconds
range: "0..120000"
units: "millisecond"

          
"level": "string" SPF Level for prefix prioritization
range: "0..2"
default: "0"

        }
      ]
    },
    
"maximum-paths": "integer", Maximum number of active parallel paths per\nroute
range: "1..64"

    
"adjacency-check": "string", Suppress check for consistent AF support on\nreceived IIHs
    : {
Metric configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      : [
Metric for redistributed routes: <0-63>\nfor narrow, <0-16777215> for widePUTPOSTDELETEGET
        {
          
"metric": "string", Metric for redistributed routes: <0-63>\nfor narrow, <0-16777215> for wide
range: "1..16777215"

          
"level": "string" SPF Level for prefix prioritization
range: "0..2"
default: "0"

        }
      ]
    },
    : {
Enable Segment Routing configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      
"bundle-member-adj-sid": "null", Enable per bundle member adjacency SID

      
"mpls": "string", MPLS configuration. MPLS configuration will\nonly be applied for the IPv4-unicast\naddress-family.
      : {
Enable Segment Routing prefix SID map\nconfigurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        
"receive": "boolean", If TRUE, remote prefix SID map\nadvertisements will be used. If FALSE,\nthey will not be used.

        
"advertise-local": "null" Enable Segment Routing prefix SID map\nadvertise local

      }
    },
    
"advertise-link-attributes": "boolean", If TRUE, advertise additional link\nattributes in our LSP
    : {
Filter routes sent to the RIBPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      
"prefix-list-name": "string", Name of the Prefix List

      
"route-policy-name": "string" Route policy to control redistribution.

    },
    
"single-topology": "null", Run IPv6 Unicast using the standard (IPv4\nUnicast) topology
    : {
Control origination of a default route with\nthe option of using a policy.  If no policy\nis specified the default route is\nadvertised with zero cost in level 2 only.PUTPOSTDELETEGET
      
"policy-name": "string", Policy name

      
"external": "null", Flag to indicate that the default prefix\nshould be originated as an external route

    },
    : {

      : {

range: "0..2"
default: "0"

          }
        ]
      }
    },
    
"topology-id": "integer", Set the topology ID for a named\n(non-default) topology. This object must be\nset before any other configuration is\nsupplied for a named (non-default) topology\n, and must be the last configuration object\nto be removed. This item should not be\nsupplied for the non-named default\ntopologies.
range: "6..4095"
    : {

"rib-update-delay": "integer", Value of delay in msecs in updating RIB
range: "1000..65535"
units: "millisecond"
default: "5000"

    },
    
"route-source-first-hop": "boolean", If TRUE, routes will be installed with the\nIP address of the first-hop node as the\nsource instead of the originating node

    
"default-admin-distance": "integer", Default IS-IS administrative distance\nconfiguration.
range: "1..255"
default: "115"
    : {

      : [

        {
          : [

            {

range: "0..65535"

              
"levels": "string", Levels to redistribute routes into

              
"as-yy": "integer", Second half of BGP AS number in XX.YY\nformat. Mandatory if Protocol is BGP and\nmust not be specified otherwise. Must be\na non-zero value if first half is zero.
range: "0..4294967295"

range: "1..16777215"

            }

            }
          ],

range: "1..16777215"

      },

      }

range: "0..2"
default: "0"

        }
      ]
    },

          }

range: "101..10000"
default: "200"

      },

range: "100..65535"
units: "millisecond"
default: "100"

    }
  }
}

SEGMENT-ROUTING - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-clns-isis-cfg:isis/instances/instance/{instance-name}/afs/af/{af-name saf-name}/af-data/segment-routing/

Update operation of resource: segment-routing

segment-routing_schema

segment-routingbody object

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

af-name saf-name: string
in path

ID of af-name saf-name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
Enable Segment Routing configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    
"bundle-member-adj-sid": "null", Enable per bundle member adjacency SID

    
"mpls": "string", Prefer segment routing labels over LDP\nlabels
    : {
Enable Segment Routing prefix SID map\nconfigurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      
"receive": "boolean", If TRUE, remote prefix SID map\nadvertisements will be used. If FALSE,\nthey will not be used.

      
"advertise-local": "null" Enable Segment Routing prefix SID map\nadvertise local

    }
  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

FRR-TABLE - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-clns-isis-cfg:isis/instances/instance/{instance-name}/afs/af/{af-name saf-name}/af-data/frr-table/

Update operation of resource: frr-table

frr-table_schema

frr-tablebody object

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

af-name saf-name: string
in path

ID of af-name saf-name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
Fast-ReRoute configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    : {
FRR use candidate only configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        {
          
"frr-type": "string", Computation Type

          
"level": "string" Level to which configuration applies
range: "0..2"
default: "0"

        }
      ]
    },
    : {
FRR tiebreakers configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        {
          
"tiebreaker": "string", Tiebreaker for which configuration\napplies

          
"index": "integer", Preference order among tiebreakers
range: "1..255"

          
"level": "string" Level to which configuration applies
range: "0..2"
default: "0"

        }
      ]
    },
    : {
FRR prefix-limit configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        {
          
"priority": "string", Compute for all prefixes upto the\nspecified priority

          
"frr-type": "string", Computation Type

          
"level": "string" Level to which configuration applies
range: "0..2"
default: "0"

        }
      ]
    },
    : {
Load share prefixes across multiple\nbackupsPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        {
          
"load-sharing": "string", Load sharing

          
"level": "string" Level to which configuration applies
range: "0..2"
default: "0"

        }
      ]
    },
    : {
FRR remote LFA prefix list filter\nconfigurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        {
          
"prefix-list-name": "string", Name of the prefix list

          
"level": "string" Level to which configuration applies
range: "0..2"
default: "0"

        }
      ]
    }
  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

range: "1..255"

      ]
    },
    : {
FRR prefix-limit configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        {
          
"priority": "string", Compute for all prefixes upto the\nspecified priority

"level": "string" Level to which configuration applies
range: "0..2"
default: "0"

        }
      ]
    },

"level": "string" Level to which configuration applies

        }

Update operation of resource: router-id

router-id_schema

router-idbody object

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

af-name saf-name: string
in path

ID of af-name saf-name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
Traffic Engineering stable IP address for\nsystemPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    
"interface-name": "string", Interface with designated stable IP\naddress to be used as a router ID. This\nmust be a Loopback interface. Precisely\none of Address and Interface must be\nspecified.

    
"address": "string" IPv4 address to be used as a router ID.\nPrecisely one of Address and Interface\nmust be specified.

  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

spf-prefix-prioritiesbody object

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

af-name saf-name: string
in path

ID of af-name saf-name

Request Example
{
  : {
SPF Prefix Priority configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      {
        
"prefix-priority-type": "string", SPF Priority to assign matching prefixes

        
"admin-tag": "integer", Tag value to determine prefixes for this\npriority
range: "1..4294967295"

        
"access-list-name": "string", Access List to determine prefixes for\nthis priority

        
"level": "string" SPF Level for prefix prioritization
range: "0..2"
default: "0"

      }
    ]
  }
}

range: "0..2"
default: "0"

      }
    ]
  }
}

Update operation of resource: ucmp

ucmp_schema

ucmpbody object

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

af-name saf-name: string
in path

ID of af-name saf-name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
UCMP (UnEqual Cost MultiPath) configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    : {
Interfaces excluded from UCMP path\ncomputationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        {
          
"interface-name": "string" Name of the interface to be excluded

        }
      ]
    },
    : {
UCMP feature enable configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      
"variance": "integer", Value of variance
range: "101..10000"
default: "200"

      
"prefix-list-name": "string" Name of the Prefix List

    },
    
"delay-interval": "integer" Delay in msecs between primary SPF and\nUCMP computation
range: "100..65535"
units: "millisecond"
default: "100"

  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

PROPAGATIONS - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-clns-isis-cfg:isis/instances/instance/{instance-name}/afs/af/{af-name saf-name}/af-data/propagations/

Update operation of resource: propagations

propagations_schema

propagationsbody object

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

af-name saf-name: string
in path

ID of af-name saf-name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
Route propagation configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      {
        
"route-policy-name": "string", Route policy limiting routes to be\npropagated

        
"destination-level": "string", Destination level for routes.  Must\ndiffer from SourceLevel

        
"source-level": "string" Source level for routes

      }
    ]
  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

REDISTRIBUTIONS - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-clns-isis-cfg:isis/instances/instance/{instance-name}/afs/af/{af-name saf-name}/af-data/redistributions/

Update operation of resource: redistributions

redistributions_schema

redistributionsbody object

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

af-name saf-name: string
in path

ID of af-name saf-name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
Protocol redistribution configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      {
        : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          {
            
"as-xx": "integer", First half of BGP AS number in XX.YY\nformat.  Mandatory if Protocol is BGP\nand must not be specified otherwise.\nMust be a non-zero value if second half\nis zero.
range: "0..65535"

            
"levels": "string", Levels to redistribute routes into

            
"as-yy": "integer", Second half of BGP AS number in XX.YY\nformat. Mandatory if Protocol is BGP and\nmust not be specified otherwise. Must be\na non-zero value if first half is zero.
range: "0..4294967295"

            
"metric": "integer", Metric for redistributed routes: <0-63>\nfor narrow, <0-16777215> for wide
range: "1..16777215"

            
"metric-type": "string", IS-IS metric type

            
"ospf-route-type": "integer", OSPF route types to redistribute.  May\nonly be specified if Protocol is OSPF.

            
"route-policy-name": "string" Route policy to control redistribution.

          }
        ],
        : [
 PUTPOSTDELETEGET
          {
            
"levels": "string", Levels to redistribute routes into

            
"as-zz": "integer", Eigrp as number.
range: "1..65535"

            
"metric": "integer", Metric for redistributed routes: <0-63>\nfor narrow, <0-16777215> for wide
range: "1..16777215"

            
"metric-type": "string", IS-IS metric type

            
"ospf-route-type": "integer", OSPF route types to redistribute.  May\nonly be specified if Protocol is OSPF.

            
"route-policy-name": "string" Route policy to control redistribution.

          }
        ],
        
"protocol-name": "string", The protocol to be redistributed.  OSPFv3\nmay not be specified for an IPv4 topology\nand OSPF may not be specified for an IPv6\ntopology.
        : {
connected or static or rip or subscriber\nor mobilePUTPOSTDELETEGET
          
"metric": "integer", Metric for redistributed routes: <0-63>\nfor narrow, <0-16777215> for wide
range: "1..16777215"

          
"levels": "string", Levels to redistribute routes into

          
"metric-type": "string", IS-IS metric type

          
"ospf-route-type": "integer", OSPF route types to redistribute.  May\nonly be specified if Protocol is OSPF.

          
"route-policy-name": "string" Route policy to control redistribution.

        },
        : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          {
            
"levels": "string", Levels to redistribute routes into

            
"instance-name": "string", Protocol Instance Identifier.  Mandatory\nfor ISIS, OSPF and application, must not\nbe specified otherwise.

            
"metric": "integer", Metric for redistributed routes: <0-63>\nfor narrow, <0-16777215> for wide
range: "1..16777215"

            
"metric-type": "string", IS-IS metric type

            
"ospf-route-type": "integer", OSPF route types to redistribute.  May\nonly be specified if Protocol is OSPF.

            
"route-policy-name": "string" Route policy to control redistribution.

          }
        ]
      }
    ]
  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

range: "1..16777215"

          
"metric-type": "string", IS-IS metric type

          
"ospf-route-type": "integer", OSPF route types to redistribute.  May\nonly be specified if Protocol is OSPF.

          
"route-policy-name": "string" Route policy to control redistribution.

        }
      ],
      : [
 PUTPOSTDELETEGET
        {
          
"levels": "string", Levels to redistribute routes into

          
"as-zz": "integer", Eigrp as number.
range: "1..65535"

          
"metric": "integer", Metric for redistributed routes: <0-63>\nfor narrow, <0-16777215> for wide
range: "1..16777215"

          
"metric-type": "string", IS-IS metric type

          
"ospf-route-type": "integer", OSPF route types to redistribute.  May\nonly be specified if Protocol is OSPF.

          
"route-policy-name": "string" Route policy to control redistribution.

        }
      ],
      
"protocol-name": "string", The protocol to be redistributed.  OSPFv3\nmay not be specified for an IPv4 topology\nand OSPF may not be specified for an IPv6\ntopology.
      : {
connected or static or rip or subscriber\nor mobilePUTPOSTDELETEGET
        
"metric": "integer", Metric for redistributed routes: <0-63>\nfor narrow, <0-16777215> for wide
range: "1..16777215"

        
"levels": "string", Levels to redistribute routes into

        
"metric-type": "string", IS-IS metric type

        
"ospf-route-type": "integer", OSPF route types to redistribute.  May\nonly be specified if Protocol is OSPF.

        
"route-policy-name": "string" Route policy to control redistribution.

      },
      : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        {
          
"levels": "string", Levels to redistribute routes into

          
"instance-name": "string", Protocol Instance Identifier.  Mandatory\nfor ISIS, OSPF and application, must not\nbe specified otherwise.

range: "1..16777215"

        }
      ]
    }
  ]
}

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-clns-isis-cfg:isis/instances/instance/{instance-name}/afs/af/{af-name saf-name}/af-data/redistributions/redistribution/{protocol-name}/ospf-or-ospfv3-or-isis-or-application/{instance-name}/

Update operation of resource: ospf-or-ospfv3-or-isis-or-application

ospf-or-ospfv3-or-isis-or-application_schema

ospf-or-ospfv3-or-isis-or-applicationbody object

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

af-name saf-name: string
in path

ID of af-name saf-name

protocol-name: string
in path

ID of protocol-name

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    
"levels": "string", Levels to redistribute routes into

    
"instance-name": "string", Protocol Instance Identifier.  Mandatory\nfor ISIS, OSPF and application, must not\nbe specified otherwise.

    
"metric": "integer", Metric for redistributed routes: <0-63>\nfor narrow, <0-16777215> for wide
range: "1..16777215"

    
"metric-type": "string", IS-IS metric type

    
"ospf-route-type": "integer", OSPF route types to redistribute.  May\nonly be specified if Protocol is OSPF.

    
"route-policy-name": "string" Route policy to control redistribution.

  }

BGP - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-clns-isis-cfg:isis/instances/instance/{instance-name}/afs/af/{af-name saf-name}/af-data/redistributions/redistribution/{protocol-name}/bgp/{as-xx as-yy}/

Update operation of resource: bgp

bgp_schema

bgpbody object

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

af-name saf-name: string
in path

ID of af-name saf-name

protocol-name: string
in path

ID of protocol-name

as-xx as-yy: string
in path

ID of as-xx as-yy

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    
"as-xx": "integer", First half of BGP AS number in XX.YY\nformat.  Mandatory if Protocol is BGP\nand must not be specified otherwise.\nMust be a non-zero value if second half\nis zero.
range: "0..65535"

    
"levels": "string", Levels to redistribute routes into

    
"as-yy": "integer", Second half of BGP AS number in XX.YY\nformat. Mandatory if Protocol is BGP and\nmust not be specified otherwise. Must be\na non-zero value if first half is zero.
range: "0..4294967295"

    
"metric": "integer", Metric for redistributed routes: <0-63>\nfor narrow, <0-16777215> for wide
range: "1..16777215"

    
"metric-type": "string", IS-IS metric type

    
"ospf-route-type": "integer", OSPF route types to redistribute.  May\nonly be specified if Protocol is OSPF.

    
"route-policy-name": "string" Route policy to control redistribution.

  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

BGP - Create

POST Cisco-IOS-XR-clns-isis-cfg:isis/instances/instance/{instance-name}/afs/af/{af-name saf-name}/af-data/redistributions/redistribution/{protocol-name}/bgp/{as-xx as-yy}/

bgp_schema

bgpbody object

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

af-name saf-name: string
in path

ID of af-name saf-name

in path

ID of protocol-name

as-xx as-yy: string
in path

ID of as-xx as-yy

Request Example
{
  : {
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    
"as-xx": "integer", First half of BGP AS number in XX.YY\nformat.  Mandatory if Protocol is BGP\nand must not be specified otherwise.\nMust be a non-zero value if second half\nis zero.
range: "0..65535"

    
"levels": "string", Levels to redistribute routes into

    
"as-yy": "integer", Second half of BGP AS number in XX.YY\nformat. Mandatory if Protocol is BGP and\nmust not be specified otherwise. Must be\na non-zero value if first half is zero.
range: "0..4294967295"

    
"metric": "integer", Metric for redistributed routes: <0-63>\nfor narrow, <0-16777215> for wide
range: "1..16777215"

    
"metric-type": "string", IS-IS metric type

    
"ospf-route-type": "integer", OSPF route types to redistribute.  May\nonly be specified if Protocol is OSPF.

SPF-PERIODIC-INTERVALS - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-clns-isis-cfg:isis/instances/instance/{instance-name}/afs/af/{af-name saf-name}/af-data/spf-periodic-intervals/

Update operation of resource: spf-periodic-intervals

spf-periodic-intervals_schema

spf-periodic-intervalsbody object

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

af-name saf-name: string
in path

ID of af-name saf-name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
Peoridic SPF configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      {
        
"periodic-interval": "integer", Maximum interval in between SPF runs in\nseconds
range: "0..3600"
units: "second"

        
"level": "string" Level to which configuration applies
range: "0..2"
default: "0"

      }
    ]
  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

}

SPF-PERIODIC-INTERVAL - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-clns-isis-cfg:isis/instances/instance/{instance-name}/afs/af/{af-name saf-name}/af-data/spf-periodic-intervals/spf-periodic-interval/{level}/

Update operation of resource: spf-periodic-interval

spf-periodic-interval_schema

spf-periodic-intervalbody object

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

af-name saf-name: string
in path

ID of af-name saf-name

level: string
in path

ID of level

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    {
      
"periodic-interval": "integer", Maximum interval in between SPF runs in\nseconds
range: "0..3600"
units: "second"

      
"level": "string" Level to which configuration applies
range: "0..2"
default: "0"

    }
  ]
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

in path

in path

in path

  : [

in path

in path

in path

spf-periodic-interval_schema

400 Bad Request

{
  : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    {

range: "0..2"
default: "0"

    }

DISTRIBUTE-LIST-IN - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-clns-isis-cfg:isis/instances/instance/{instance-name}/afs/af/{af-name saf-name}/af-data/distribute-list-in/

Update operation of resource: distribute-list-in

distribute-list-in_schema

distribute-list-inbody object

instance-name: string
in path

ID of instance-name

af-name saf-name: string
in path

ID of af-name saf-name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
Filter routes sent to the RIBPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    
"prefix-list-name": "string", Prefix list to control routes installed in\nRIB.

    
"route-policy-name": "string" Route policy to control routes installed\nin RIB.

  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json
